segments.text: That boy is standing on a stool that looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookie jar, and he’s not even steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see his little sister waiting below, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and it’s wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, but she doesn’t seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open, framing the whole risky scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman isn’t watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet, and if he falls, it’ll be even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he grabs the cookie and gets down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
